name: Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulkán KM 17 B, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Cancún, 1.6 km from El Rey Beach, Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property features a hot tub, evening entertainment and a concierge service. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a balcony. All rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box, while some rooms come with a terrace and some have sea views. A continental, American or vegetarian breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. You can play table tennis and tennis at the 5-star resort. Playa Marlin is 1.6 km from Coral Level at Iberostar Selection Cancun, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 1.2 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 19 km from the accommodation.

description: Set in Cancún in the Quintana Roo Region, 5 km from La Isla Shopping Mall, Iberostar Selection Cancun \features a private beach area and water sports facilities. There is a restaurant and guests can have fun at the water park. Every room at this resort is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV and DVD player. You will find a coffee machine in the room. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bath. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hair dryer. There is a 24-hour front desk, hairdresser's and gift shop at the property. You can play tennis at the resort. It also offers car hire. Coco Bongo is 8 km from Iberostar Selection Cancun, while Cancun Government Palace is 11 km from the property. Cancun International Airport is 10 km away.

name: Catalonia Grand Costa Mujeres
address: Carr. a Punta Sam SM 6, Lote 6 Zona Costera, Zona Continental, 77400 Punta Sam, Quintana Roo
description: Catalonia Costa Mujeres All Suites & Spais a 5* family resort, full of life and situated at one of the most beautiful beaches of the Mexican Caribbean. Our QUINTA AVENIDA, inspired by the popular Quinta Avenida of Playa del Carmen, is the heart of our resort, harboring a great variety of innovative restaurants, bars and stores. Two large pools in different areas of the hotel, one of them destinated to those who look for relaxation, while the other offers a great variety of activities and fun for the whole family. Our comfortable rooms–all suites including several rooms with swimup pool, the wide gastronomic offer, our AlegríaSpa and a complete entertainment program, make this resort the ideal place for a wonderful vacation either as a couple or with the family. Local attractions include tours to Isla Mujeres and Holbox island. For those interested in Mayan culture we recommend a visit to the Mayan Museum and the archeological site “El Rey”, both located in Cancun hotel zone.FarePortal

This beachfront resort will feature 429 suites, including the xhale club and the Unlimited-Luxury® vacation concept with a variety of luxurious amenities and services. Breathless Cancun Soul Resort & Spa also features the standard CleanComplete Verification™ protocols on property. This 360-degree quality, safety and hygiene program takes into account every aspect of the on-property experience, backed by the highly-respected third-party certificationWebBeds

name: Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe
address: Kukulcan Km 17, Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Cancun, the resort is a short walk from Iberostar Cancun Peninsula Convention Centre and offers a private beach, free Wi-Fi and an outdoor pool. It is a short drive from Hard Rock Cafe Cancun and provides free public parking on site. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a drink at the bar. It provides family-friendly facilities, with room layouts and services for families of any size, as well as a kids pool and a kids club. Those staying at the property can also hire a bicycle to explore Cancun and its surrounds. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a flat-screen TV, tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Hilton Cancun Mar Caribe boasts convenient dining options, including Mediterranean and Italian dishes at La Luce and Mexican meals at Maxal. Eateries at the resort include Azulinda and Noriku. A selection of dining options are also available in the area. The resort is less than a 20-minute drive from Cancun International Airport and Iberostar Cancun Golf Course is a brief stroll away. The staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Royalton CHIC Cancun, An Autograph Collection Resort - Adults Only
address: Km 9.7 Blvd. Kukulcan, Zona Hotel, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Whether unwinding on our private white-sand beach or dancing with CHIC Angels at our Rooftop Cabana Lounge pool party, Royalton CHIC Cancun adults-only aged 18+, is where you can Party Your Way in the glimmering heart of downtown Cancun. Take in the breathtaking views of the impossibly beautiful Caribbean or mesmerizing sunsets over the Nichupté Lagoon from your stylish suite, then set out for an effervescent adventure in lively Mexico.Marriott

name: Grand Fiesta Americana Coral Beach Cancun
address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 9.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Location This excellent luxury hotel is situated directly beside the fine sandy beach on the Mexican Caribbean coast. The hotel lies in the tourist centre of Cancún, just a few minutes' walk from the town centre where guests will discover shops, boutiques, cafés, bars, restaurants and nightlife venues. Facilities The establishment comprises a total of 602 accommodation units. Guests of the establishment are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. A lift can be used to access the upper floors. Services such as a cloakroom, a safe and currency exchange facilities make for a comfortable stay. Internet access (for a fee) and wireless internet access (for a fee) are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room, a café and a bar. The grounds of the establishment feature a playground and an attractive garden. Additional features of the establishment include a newspaper stand and a playroom. Guests arriving by car can park their vehicles in the garage (for a fee) or car park (for a fee). Among the additional services available are medical assistance, room service, a laundry and a hairdressing salon. Rooms All accommodation units feature air conditioning and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. A balcony or terrace comes with most rooms as standard. Many of the rooms also offer a sea view, adding to the ambience. Each accommodation unit features a double bed or a king-size bed. Among the amenities are a safe and a minibar. Tea and coffee making equipment is included as standard. An ironing set is also available to guests. Most accommodation units are equipped with internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a CD player and an alarm clock. Wheelchair-accessible rooms are also bookable. In the bathrooms, guests will find a shower, a bathtub, a spa bath and a hairdryer. Sports/Entertainment The establishment offers an outdoor pool and a children's pool. Sun loungers and parasols offer the ideal way to unwind. A hot tub provides an opportunity for relaxation. The poolside bar serves a selection of refreshing drinks. For those wishing to enjoy some exercise, tennis and beach volleyball are offered onsite. The establishment offers indoor sporting activities such as table tennis, or for a fee, a gym. The establishment offers various wellness options, including a spa and a sauna, or for a fee, a steam bath and massage treatments. An entertainment programme, an entertainment programme for adults, an entertainment programme for children and a kids' club provide guests with recreational options during their free time. Meals The establishment offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment All major credit cards, including American Express, VISA, Diners Club, JCB and MasterCard, are accepted for payment.WebBeds

description: Wyndham Alltra Cancun Resort offers a luxury base in Cancun and features a swimming pool, complimentary wireless internet and free private parking on-site. It provides 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. The resort features a 24/7 reception, plus a kids club and a sun deck. Guests can try out the recreational facilities on offer, such as miniature golf, a playground and billiards. It also has its very own spa and wellness center, Aura Spa. Every contemporary room at Wyndham Alltra Cancun Resort comes with a refrigerator and cable/satellite channels, while the bathrooms offer showers and hair dryers. They all have a flat-screen TV, internet access and tea and coffee making facilities. Guests of Wyndham Alltra Cancun Resort are welcome to sample international cuisine at Ventanas, or try local and Asian dishes at Azul. Dining options at the resort include Café México and Viaggio. Other dining options are also available. For those who enjoy exploring local restaurants and cafés, there is a wide range right on the doorstep. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organize activities in Cancun.HotelsCombined

name: Suites Malecon Cancun
address: Av. Bonampak Sm 6 M1 L1, 77503 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Only 10 minutes’ walk from Boulevard Kukulkan, Suites Malecon Cancun features panoramic views of Cancun city and Nichupté Lagoon. The property is in the same location as Américas Shopping Mall. The apartments are fully equipped and include ironing facilities, satellite channels in a flat-screen TV, safe, and terraces overlooking the lagoon and the city landscape. They are divided into seating area, dining area, well-equipped kitchen, bedroom and private bathroom with shower. Toiletries are provided. Las Américas Shopping Mall features several different restaurants that guests can explore, or they can also choose to prepare their own meals en suite. The complex has an infinity pool with a hot tub, BBQ facilities, plus sun terraces with beds and loungers. The facilities also offer a gym and a business centre. The International Airport is 20 minutes’ drive from the complex and Cancun’s town centre is 10 minutes’ drive away.

name: Atelier Playa Mujeres
address: Lote 13, Rth-4, SM003, Mz.001, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: General description: The hotel Atelier Playa Mujeres (adults only) is located right on a sandy beach. At the beach, there are sun loungers and sun umbrellas free of charge. The town Cancun is around 14 km away (Playa del Carmen around 80 km, Tulum around 143 km). For mobility there is a car rental company. The airport (CUN) is approx. 28 km away. Amenities: The 5-storey beach hotel consists of a main building and an adjoining building, and has 429 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 12:00), a lobby with bar, 6 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), a shop, theater, a free parking area and a money changing facility. For the meals, there are 8 restaurants (air-conditioned). In a total 7 bars, you can relax in good company. WiFi is available for free. Room service is free of charge. Room cleaning, laundry / ironing service, concierge service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas and sun loungers for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Table tennis (where applicable, for a fee) and fitness. Spa area, sauna, solarium and massages available for a fee. Entertainment for adults: activity programme. Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: Euro / MasterCard, Visa and American Express. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

description: Hello and welcome to Canopy by Hilton Cancun La Isla, a new, urban hotel beside the lagoon in Cancun hotel zone. Enjoy being steps from some of the best shopping brands, restaurants and white sand beaches. We will introduce you to the neighborhood with a local welcome gift at check-in. At Canopy, we have got you covered. Our Just-Right Rooms are comfortable, modern spaces with the amenities you want, like free WiFi, a 55-inch HDTV, murals from local artists and our exclusively designed Canopy beds. Deluxe rooms feature views of the ocean and double shower, while our suites include a living room, dining area, espresso/bar cart and hanging chair as well as signature Canopy bathrobe. Feel better going forward and fill up your bottles with filtered water on every floor. Welcome the day in the cafe with a delicious artisanal breakfast made with fresh ingredients and local produce or have a Canopy Break Fast bag delivered to your door. Dine at Azulinda Cafe and Bar or head to the roof to sip cocktails, fresh juices or coffee al fresco. Enjoy the view while working out or relaxing poolside at our rooftop fitness center and outdoor pool. If there is business to be done, settle into our co-working space with comfortable seating and plenty of charging outlets. We also offer three boardrooms for meetings and events, and our beautiful terrace will accommodate up to 36 guests. Enjoy all Hilton Honors benefits at our Energizing hotel.Hilton

Cancun International Airport is a 10 minutes’ drive from Nizuc Resort & Spa. The center of Cancun can be reached within 25 minutes by car.

description: The property is located in Cancun's popular hotel zone. The resort sits on the beach looking out at the beautiful Caribbean Sea. The hotel is modern with beautiful pools, swim up bars and multiple lounges and restaurants. The resorts fine chefs create unique dining experiences for the entire family in our specialty restaurants, featuring a mix of International, Mexican, Asiatic, Italian, and a Steakhouse cuisines. Guests can spend the night dancing to one of our live DJ's. Not only the lavish spacious rooms and suite amenities include a double hydro spa tub, but you can enjoy the stunning ocean views from your private balcony. Customers can choose from one of the wonderful opportunities from the area: visiting the Pre-Colombian Tulum City, take a jungle tour, a thrilling ride on the AquaTwister, snorkelling, or just enjoy the wonderful sun set while sailing. description: Offering direct access to Cancún Beach, Live Aqua Cancun Beach Resort Cancun. Only features an outdoor swimming pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. It has attractive rooms with balconies, 9 restaurants, 5 bars and a spa. Each spacious, air-conditioned room at the Live Aqua Beach Resort Cancun has stylish décor with tiled floors. All rooms include a TV, coffee maker, aromatherapy products, a safety-deposit box and a minibar which is refilled daily. The stylish Siete Restaurant serves a range of Mexican cuisine, while European and Asian dishes are on offer in the mb Restaurant. The Azur serves international options set by the pool and overlooking the sea. The Aqua’s extensive spa offers hydrotherapy treatments, massage and aromatherapy. There are also hot tubs and steam baths. There is a gym available, while yoga classes are also available. Located in Cancún’s Hotel Zone, the Live Aqua is set next to Nichupte Lagoon and in front of the popular La Isla shopping centre. Please note this is an adults-only hotel.

On the other hand, you can't leave Cancun without having enjoyed its warm climate and paradisiacal beaches. In this case, you can visit the ecological parks of Xel-Ha and Xcaret. Here you can perform different activities such as swimming by underground rivers, visiting Mayan archaeological sites and diving through the reefs.Marriott

Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find air conditioning, mini bar, balcony/terrace, satellite/cable TV, seating area. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Hotel RIU Dunamar is an excellent choice from which to explore Cancun or to simply relax and rejuvenate.Agoda

A variety of water activities are also easily accessible. Relax in the beautiful surroundings in the Maya Caribe's spacious pool, overlooking the ocean. Enjoy a traditional Mexican dinner at the on-site restaurant and bar or plan the day's activities with help from the knowledgeable concierge staff. Rate does not include an eco-tax of US$1.55 per room per night, which must be paid upon arrival. Guests at the Adhara Hacienda Cancun can also enjoy on-site dining at Adhara Grill, serving Mexican and international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

Situated on the Caribbean Sea in the Cancun Hotel Zone, the studio and villa rentals at our beachfront vacation ownership resort boast endless amenities designed to make your stay exceptional. Go for a swim in our infinity pool, spend the day on our white-sand beach, indulge at our spa or play a round of kid-friendly mini golf. Satisfy your vacation cravings at our resort restaurants or relax poolside and let us bring snacks and drinks right to you. If you've come to Mexico for a wedding, let our team make planning your event a success in an outdoor space on the beach and with our custom catering services. At the end of the day, settle into your Cancun vacation rental featuring a fully equipped kitchen and a balcony with ocean views. We look forward to welcoming you to our family-friendly Cancun beach resort in Mexico.Marriott

Located in one of Mexico's most vibrant cities, our hotel is just 3 miles from Cancun International Airport and offers a complimentary shuttle to and from the transportation hub. Enjoy visiting the Mayan Ruins of Tulum, Riviera Maya, Playa Delfines, Parque de las Palapas and Punta Nizuc while here. Following a full day of sightseeing or conducting business, escape to your spacious room featuring luxury bedding, free high-speed Wi-Fi and an ergonomic workstation. Order room service and treat yourself to authentic Mexican cuisine any time from El Henequen, our on-site international restaurant. You can also relax with an evening cocktail in our lobby bar. During downtime, get in a workout at our fitness center and take a relaxing swim in our outdoor pool. Host an impressive work or social event in one of our versatile meeting spaces. You'll have everything you need for a relaxing stay at Courtyard Cancun Airport.Marriott

Guests can enjoy a poolside massage or relax in the hot tubs. A gym and 2 tennis courts are available for active guests. Crown Paradise Cancun offers free on-site activities, such as a mini-golf course and game room with billiards. A variety of cuisine is available at Club Cancun’s 7 restaurants, including Japanese specialties at Fujiyama and Italian dishes at La Piazza. Beer and cocktails are served at 6 bars, such as Club Caribe Pool Bar and Beach Bar.

The restaurant at Sky Inn Cancun serves Mexican cuisine. A a children's playground is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax on the sun terrace. Cancun Government Palace is 2.3 km from Sky Inn Cancun, while Cancun Bus Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 17 km from the apartment.

description: Situated just 30 minutes north of Cancun International Airport, Villa del Palmar Cancun redefines the meaning of luxury vacation accommodations and five star resort facilities in Cancun’s most breathtaking Caribbean location. The south beach Playa Mujeres zone boasts one of the best stretches of white sandy beach in the area while the sea’s waves and currents are gently buffered by the presence of Isla Mujeres, which you can see on the horizon from Villa del Palmar Cancun. In this beautiful Caribbean setting, relaxation rules, and you have easy access to extensive spa and fitness facilities, a variety of fine dining options, seaside golf, kayaking, paddle boarding, fishing, snorkeling and scuba diving, as well as, a host of other activities on sea and land.VRBO

name: City Express Junior by Marriott Cancun
address: Avenida Nichupté SM 8 MZ 1, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: City Express Junior by Marriott Cancun is situated right next door to the popular shopping mall, Plaza Las Americas. Our hotel is the perfect choice for your trip to the gorgeous Mexican Caribbean. Make the most of your visit, and take some time to check out Cancun's many tourist attractions. We recommend a guided tour of the ruins in Chichen Itza, one of the largest Mayan ruins. Or soak up the sun on a boat ride to Isla Mujeres, a tropical island with white sandy beaches and massive coral reefs. If you're feeling adventurous, take a trip to one of our underground lakes (cenotes). Go scuba diving or snorkelling in crystal clear water and see the colourful sea creatures that live just below the surface. For a break from the heat, duck into Plaza Las Americas or Plaza La Peninsula and explore the shops and restaurants. And after the sun goes down, get ready to experience Cancun's exciting nightlife.Dance the night away at one of the most popular dance clubs Coco Bongo.Marriott

There is also a modern gym, and yoga classes are offered.

For medical treatment in emergencies there is a hospital around 22 km away. The airport (CUN) is approx. 32 km away. The hotel and airport are linked by a shuttle (for a fee). Amenities: The 7-storey beach hotel has 305 rooms in total. It offers its guests a reception (check-in from 15:00, check-out until 11:00), a lobby with bar, 3 lifts, air conditioning, a safe (for free), theater and a free parking area. For the meals, there are three restaurants (air-conditioned). You will be warmly welcomed in both the hotel’s bars. WiFi is available for free. Room cleaning and concierge service are free of charge. Laundry / ironing service and medical service are available for a fee. Pool: In the outdoor area of the hotel you will find one fresh water pool with a children´s pool integrated into the main pool. Here, there are sun umbrellas for free available. Refreshing beverages can be consumed directly at the pool bar. Meals: Breakfast from the buffet. Sport and Leisure: Sports and entertainment: Fitness. A golf course is located approx. 16 km from the hotel. Spa area and massages available for a fee. Solarium, steam bath and hamam available (where applicable for a fee). Entertainment for adults: activity programme. In the outside area of the hotel there is a play area for children. Child supervision: activity programme for children (from 4 - 12 years) and babysitting (for a fee). Additional information: Additional fees may apply for certain facilities, amenities or activities. Some services depend on the local climatic conditions and the season. Languages spoken: English and Spanish. Accepted methods of payment: American Express and Visa. Some services and facilities might be closed or offered with restrictions due to COVID19 Prevention measurement. Changes can be applied without previous notice.Ticket Package

Rooms have private balconies. 32-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature deep soaking bathtubs and complimentary toiletries. Amenities Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, outdoor tennis courts, and a fitness center. Additional features at this aparthotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). name: City Express by Marriott Cancun
address: Av. Nichupté S.M. 8 Mza 1 Lote 4, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: City Express by Marriott Cancun is the ideal place to stay on your next vacation to this Mexican paradise. Our hotel is located in the city center, next to the boardwalk and Las Americas mall, near the most beautiful beaches of the city. Cancun is a renowned tourist destination, known for its magical beaches with crystalline waters and soft white sand. Two popular beaches nearby City Express by Marriott are playa Tortugas and Punta Cancun, both perfect for relaxing and enjoying yourself with friends or family.But there is a lot more to see while you're here. Make the most of your trip and visit the Mayan ruins in Tulum, Coba, Uxmal and Chichen Itz. There are several different tours you can take to see these archeological sites.If you've got the time, we recommend you take a trip to Xcaret, an eco-archeological theme park where you and your family can see all kinds of wildlife and enjoy performances, showcasing the Mayan culture. We have parking subject to availability.Marriott

name: Riu Palace Las Americas
address: Blvd. Kukulcan, Km 8.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: A slice of Spain on the Caribbean is on display at Riu Palace Las Americas, in the heart of the hotel zone and near shops and night clubs. This beachside resort is 8.5 km (less than 6 mi) from downtown Cancun. The resort features 6 restaurants, 5 bars, 2 outdoor pools, an outdoor spa tub, and a swimming pool. Room rates include 24-hour room service, spa, gym, water-sports equipment, daily activities, and RIU evening programs. Most Riu Palace guestrooms feature balconies with ocean or lagoon views. All suites feature minibars, satellite TVs, turndown service, WIFI, in-room safes, and bathroom amenities.WebBeds

name: Hive Cancun
address: Av Huayacán, Smza 336 Mza 9 Lote 1, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Hive Cancun by G Hotels has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre, a restaurant and bar in Cancún. The property is around 5.3 km from Cancun Underwater Museum, 9 km from Beto Avila Stadium and 10 km from Cancun Government Palace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel the rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a city view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a coffee machine. Hive Cancun by G Hotels offers 4-star accommodation with a hot tub. Cancun Bus Station is 11 km from the accommodation, while La Isla Shopping Mall is 22 km from the property. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 13 km from Hive Cancun by G Hotels.

address: Carr Fed Cancun-Puerto Morelos SM47 M01, 77506 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The 4* Avani Cancún Airport is located just seven minutes from Cancún International Airport, close to local tourist attractions. Surrounded by lush jungle greenery and a short distance from Cancún’s beautiful sandy beaches, the hotel offers business and leisure guests 140 comfortable rooms and suites to choose from. All the rooms feature a contemporary design, Lavazza coffee machines, large flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. An international buffet breakfast is served in the hotel restaurant daily, with an early-bird option for early risers. Gluten-free and children’s options menu are available on request. The hotel’s dining options include local, national and international cuisine, with snacks, meals and drinks available in the hotel restaurant, the lobby bar or the poolside terrace bar. Meetings and special events can be held in the hotel’s well-equipped events spaces, with capacity of up to 265 guests. Those staying at the hotel enjoy complimentary access to the gym and the outdoor pool, where they can relax in lush, green surroundings.NH Hoteles

address: Av. Javier Rojo Gomez SM 002 Mza 25 LT 1, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set in Puerto Morelos, a few steps from Playa Puerto Morelos, The Fives Oceanfront offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. The property features a bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a microwave, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. The Fives Oceanfront features certain units with city views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation every room has bed linen and towels. Guests at The Fives Oceanfront can enjoy a continental breakfast. You can play table tennis at this 5-star hotel, and the area is popular for cycling. Cancun Underwater Museum is 30 km from the hotel, while ADO International Bus Station is 36 km away. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 25 km from The Fives Oceanfront.

From exclusive dining to private beach and pool access and luxury accommodations, our resort-within-a-resort offers a premium Riviera Cancun getaway that also affords you access to all our neighboring Royalton Riviera Cancun has to offer.Marriott

Guest rooms at the Adhara Express include a coffee maker and satellite LCD TV. The rooms also provide an in-room safe, a private balcony and air conditioning. Available services include laundry, baby sitting and a tour desk. Tulum, Xel-Ha and Chichen-Itza are within driving distance of the Ramada Cancun, Mexico. The Dolphin Discovery Isla Mujeres is 7 miles from the hotel.

description: Located on a 14-mile stretch of pristine beachfront in Cancun’s hotel zone, NYX Hotel Cancun. has an infinity pool overlooking the Caribbean Sea. Some of its rooms have views of the sea or Nichupté Lagoon. All air-conditioned rooms at the NYX Hotel Cancun feature a flat-screen cable TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. A coffee maker and free WiFi access are also included. Bellavista Restaurant offers international options. The Chianti Restaurant offers Italian cuisine, open for dinner with prior reservation required. There is also a poolside bar, as well as a lobby bar. The surrounding beaches are popular for water sports. You can go scuba diving at the 2 coral reefs or visit ancient Mayan sites nearby. Cancun Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

address: Blvd. Kukulcan Km. 11, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Please do NOT book Instantly please enquire for latest rates and availability before booking,as pricing is dynamic,we will get back to you straight away. This hotel is next to the beach, only 20 minutes from downtown Cancun. The hotel features 2 outdoor pools, a restaurant and rooms with satellite TV. Flamingo Cancun Resort also features air conditioning and a private bathroom in every guest room. The rooms offer a view of the lagoon or a view of the Caribbean Sea. Guests can enjoy music, activities and a swim-up bar at the main pool. The Flamingo also offers an oceanfront pool with a relaxing atmosphere. A gym is available. La Fuente Restaurant serves international cuisine with views of the Caribbean Sea. The beachfront Albatros Restaurant and Bar is open for lunch and dinner. Cocktails and music are available at the Palenque Lobby Bar. This is our guests' favorite part of Cancún, according to independent reviews. Couples in particular like the location - they rated it 8.8 for a two-person trip. We speak your language! address: Paseo Kukulcan Km 9 Lotes 9 y 9 A, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This resort is on the ocean and across from the Cancun Convention Center. It features a sauna, hot tub, an oceanfront pool, while rooms include a minibar and cable TV. Each room at Krystal Cancun provides air conditioning. A safety deposit box is available in every room. The Krystal offers on-site car rental services. Other services include event organization, laundry facilities and a tour desk. Hacienda El Mortero restaurant is on-site at Cancun Krystal. It provides traditional Mexican cuisine and live mariachi music. The resort also offers a buffet breakfast and on-site bars. Only a short walk from the Krystal Cancun are numerous shops and restaurants. Guests at the resort will also find easy access to a variety of recreational activities including snorkeling, sailing and fishing.

name: Sunset Royal Beach Resort
address: Blvd. Kukulkan Km. 10 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The charming beach hotel is strategically located in the heart of the hotel zone in Cancun. It is surrounded by the most famous nightclubs in the city as well as several restaurants and shops. The hotel is located just 25 km from Cancun International Airport. Renovated in 2011, the hotel has 204 well-equipped rooms as well as 4 restaurants and 3 bars offering gourmet food and imported drinks. The air-conditioned club resort welcomes its guests in a lobby with 24-hour reception, currency exchange facilities and lift access to the upper floors. Further facilities include a children's playground, kids' club and a cafe. Each of the well-equipped guest rooms features an en suite bathroom and a private terrace or balcony. Further room amenities include an LCD cable TV, a minibar and Internet access for a comfortable and relaxing holiday.FarePortal

name: Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown
address: Av. Tulum Sm. 4 Mza. 14 Lote 2, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown is located in the heart of downtown Cancun and very close to the world class entertainment, dining, and the beautiful white sand beaches of the Caribbean Sea. Whether traveling for business or pleasure, our central location makes us ideal for a family vacation, a weekend getaway or the business traveler needs. We're just steps from Malecon Americas, one of the biggest shopping malls in town, as well as banks, government offices, hospitals, pharmacies and restaurants. There are also plenty of fun activities nearby, including water sports, boating, water parks, fishing excursions, archaeological ruins, casinos, shopping outlets and golfing! Our guest rooms offer pillowtop mattresses, a microwave, refrigerator, coffee maker, hairdryer, iron and board, in-room safe, 32" LCD TV with premium channels, alarm clock radio, free high speed internet and free local calls. Our hotel offers a Traditional Breakfast, free wireless high-speed Internet access in all our public areas, 24-hour business center, a fully equipped fitness center, relaxing outdoor pool, room service and a Mexican Restaurant. After a day of hard work enjoy your favorite drink while watching your favorite sports game at our lobby bar. The Wyndham Garden Cancun Downtown team is focused in an excellence service. Guests are treated to warm hospitality and personal attention.Wyndham

Rooms and suites feature comforts including a private balcony or terrace and a fully stocked mini-bar. Opening November 2019- Inspired by the surrounding Mayan jungle, the all-new Now Natura Riviera Cancun will offer a unique Unlimited-Luxury® experience. Facing the Caribbean Sea on a white sand beach, the 556-room resort is a short 10-mile drive from the Cancun International AirportWebBeds

description: Perfectly situated in the exclusive gated community of Playa Mujeres, within a world-famous golf course, rests the stunning AAA Four Diamond Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort. This all-suite resort boasts 502 graciously appointed and luxuriously equipped suites, surrounded by secluded white sand beaches and the turquoise Caribbean Sea. Three levels of swimming pools spanning over 65,000 square feet, including two infinity pools with breathtaking ocean views, six hot tubs, a children’s pool, a water park for little ones, a water park for all ages. Located just 10 minutes from downtown Cancun and 35 minutes from Cancun International Airport, this luxurious resort provides an ideal vacation setting for couples and couples with children. At Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, guests will enjoy the benefits of Unlimited Luxury®, where everything is included and no wristband — unlimited premium drinks at any of our 13 bars and lounges, gourmet à la carte dining, room service, daily refreshed mini-bar, pool and beach wait Service. All adult guests (+18 years old) from Dreams Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort will have free flow access to Secrets Playa Mujeres Golf & Spa Resort, located next door. With 9 additional restaurant options, 7 additional bars, 2 additional pools and more! If Preferred Club room category is reserved, status and inclusions are provided in both properties!

description: This family-friendly beach hotel is ideally situated directly on the seemingly endless white sandy beach, overlooking the azure waters of the Caribbean Sea. The El Rey archaeological zone is only a few steps away, and Cancun International Airport can be reached within 15 minutes by car. The resort features four restaurants and three bars offering both local and international specialties. Guests might make use of the fitness centre and a spa area, and families will delight in the kids' club and nightly entertainment including theme nights, magic shows, karaoke and a casino. description: Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, nestled between the Caribbean Sea and the Lagoon of Bahia Petempich, is a vibrant, chic, and modern all-suite resort for adults seeking a sophisticated and lively getaway. The resort’s layout consisting of two horseshoe-shaped buildings and sections, each with its own unique personality and vibe, offers singles, couples, and friends the perfect balance of excitement and relaxation. Mix and mingle at a water aerobics class or relax with a curated cocktail in hand by the energy pool or become immersed in entertainment and dance to the music of international DJs in the Xcelerate zone. Enjoy the Unlimited-Luxury® inclusions of boundless gourmet dining and premium brand beverages at 9 trendy options; including five à la carte restaurants, a tapas option, one buffet, a grill on the beach, a snack area by the Xcelerate pool and The Nook café. Guests can enjoy bites at Spoon and nine bars and lounges, along with 24-hour room and concierge services, a captivating Events Calendar, and more. There is a 24-hour front desk, a cash machine and hairdresser's at the property. Free use of bicycles is available at this resort and the area is popular for snorkeling and diving. Playa del Carmen is 38 km from Breathless Riviera Cancun Resort & Spa, while Cozumel is 45 km away. Cancún International Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Emporio Cancun
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Retorno Gucumatz Km 17 L49 Zona Hotelera, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Featuring free WiFi throughout and accommodation with terraces and views of the Caribbean Sea, Emporio Cancun is set on the beach in Cancún’s Hotel Zone. It has a picturesque setting between the Caribbean Sea and Nichupté Lagoon. Each air-conditioned room and suite has bright décor and tiled flooring. All accommodation at the Emporio Cancun has cable TV. Suites also come with a kitchen and a dining and seating area. San Miguelito Archaeological Site and the Cancún Maya Museum are located in front of the hotel.

name: Hotel Kavia Plus
address: Av. Yaxchilan, Mza 15, Lote 13, SM 22, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Cancún, Hotel Kavia Plus provides air-conditioned rooms, an outdoor swimming pool, free WiFi and a terrace. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The property is non-smoking and is located 700 metres from Cancun Bus Station. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries, certain rooms at Hotel Kavia Plus also offer a city view. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American breakfast. Popular points of interest near Hotel Kavia Plus include Cancun Government Palace, Beto Avila Stadium and Cristo Rey Church. The nearest airport is Cancún International Airport, 18 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancún
address: Boulevard Kukulcan Km. 6.5, Hotel Zone, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Surrounded by tropical gardens and offering stunning views of the Caribbean Sea, this beachfront hotel in Cancun offers a sensible lodging choice to visitors to this beautiful area. Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancun is nestled in Cancun's hotel zone. Nightclubs, restaurants and shopping are just minutes away. Guests can also play golf or enjoy a variety of water sports nearby. After a swim in the outdoor pool, guests at Hotel Dos Playas Faranda Cancun can relax on the sundeck. The hotel's casual restaurant, Iguanas, serves international cuisine for breakfast, lunch and dinner.

description: This outstanding award-winning resort has a privileged location, situated on a wonderful landscape and offering a spectacular view of the Caribbean Sea. The property is set in Puerto Morelos, a famous fishing village located at only 35km from Cancun, where visitors can find multiple leisure options such as exciting excursions and water activities as well as a wide range of restaurants and cafes. This hotel offers a world of luxury to its guests with spacious and elegant rooms equipped with a private balcony or a terrace and a complimentary mini-bar refreshed daily with soft drinks and bottled water. Travellers will find unlimited activities for their entertainment as well as a spa offering the most advanced treatments. Guests can choose between six different restaurants offering a huge variety of international cuisine and various bars and lounges where they can taste a delicious cocktail.FarePortal

address: Carretera Cancun Puerto Morelos km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Located in Puerto Morelos on Bahia Petempich Beach, this 5-star resort features a renowned Gourmet Inclusive service, contemporary Caribbean-style suites, all of them including a hot tub, plus a full-service spa. It also boasts 3 outdoor pools. Every suite at the Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun offers a canopy bed, air conditioning and a balcony overlooking the ocean or gardens. The minibar is stocked daily, plus a coffee maker is included. The elegant bathrooms provide deluxe bathrobes, rain showers, marbled double sinks and a hairdryer. The Gourmet Inclusive service includes 6 different restaurants and bars. The casual-elegant restaurants offer author cuisine, which features unique courses designed by a renowned chef; world cuisine, Italian, Caribbean, Mexican. The bars include a place specialized in mojitos, cantina-style venues and a lounge serving international drinks. Azul Beach Resort Riviera Cancun also offers meeting and banquet facilities that can host up to 200 guests are also part of this resort's facilities. The 13,000-square-foot Vassa Spa and health club provides a fully-equipped gym and 18-foot rock climbing tower. A variety of classes are available at the resort including cooking, dancing and yoga.

name: Cancun Bay Resort
address: Boulevard Kukulkan Km 3.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: With breathtaking views of Mujeres Bay, Cancun Bay Resort features a beachfront pool and relaxation pool, tennis courts and a hot tub with a bar. It is located near several of Cancun's restaurants, shops and entertainment venues. Cancun International Airport is 20 minutes' drive away and Cancun's commercial area can be reached in 15 minutes by car. Each room and suite at the resort has a private balcony or terrace with views of the lagoon, garden or sea.FarePortal

name: Hotel Marina El Cid Spa
address: Boulevard el Cid Unidad 15, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This Quintana Roo hotel overlooks the Puerto Morelos National Reef Park. It features a full-service spa, full-service marina, a 22,000 square foot pool and an on-site travel company. Each suite at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort Cancun Riviera Maya is furnished with a minibar, coffee maker and provides satellite TV. Guests will also find a hairdryer, ironing facilities and a work desk in each suite. Four restaurants are available at the Hotel Marina El Cid Spa & Beach Resort. Mediterranean, casual international, Mexican and seafood dishes are offered at the hotel. The Hotel Marina Beach Resort contains a convention center and a gym. The outdoor pool features water slides and rock formations. An adults-only pool is also on site. El Cid Spa Hotel Marina & Beach Resort is less than one mile from the charming, bohemian fishing village of Puerto Morelos. It is 30 minutes from Playa del Carmen.

name: Bel Air Collection Resort & Spa Cancun
address: Blvd Kukulcan Km 20.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: This award-winning hotel is situated in a major world-renowned tourist destination, Cancun, in southeastern Mexico. Guests will find a host of tourist attractions close to the property, such as El Rey ruins and Chicen Itza, a large pre-Columbian city built by Maya. It also enjoys a unique situation close to some shopping and entertainment venues in the area. Cancun International Airport is some 12 kilometres away. Ideal for business and leisure travellers alike, this exclusive resort offers all the necessary services and amenities to rest and relax in this stunning region. The guest rooms provide breathtaking views over the ocean or the lake as well as an ultra-plush duvet for guests' convenience. A wide range of on-site dining options is offered for guests to enjoy a unique culinary experience. From international fusion cuisine to regional specialities, travellers will find a host of tempting dishes.Viajes Exito Hotels

address: Blvd Kukulkan Km 2.5, 77500 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: Steps from the beach, in Cancun's Hotel Zone, surrounded by gardens, nightclubs and restaurants, this hotel offers many meal options with 3 on-site restaurants and has free wireless internet access. Ocean View Cancun Arenas features an outdoor pool with daily activities and nightly entertainment. Guests can relax with a drink from the poolside snack bar or workout in the fitness center. After a day spent at the beach, visitors can relax on their private balcony or terrace. Guests at the Cancun Arenas Holiday Inn will appreciate a variety of restaurant options ranging from casual to fine dining. Arenas buffet-style restaurant is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Visitors can choose from beachfront dinning in Ocean Grill Tequila or fine Italian cuisine in Diletto.

name: Desire Resort & Spa Riviera Maya - Couples Only
address: Carretera Puerto Morelos Km 27.5, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: This attractive hotel lies directly beside the beach and is just 15 minutes' walk from the centre of Puerto Morelos. Guests will discover many shopping and entertainment venues. Transfer to Cancún International Airport takes about 20 minutes. This luxury hotel offers a fabulous pool and garden complex. Additionally there is a hairdresser's salon, cosy bar and an air-conditioned restaurant. Room and laundry services are additionally available for use and there are parking facilities to be found outside the hotel. Each of the tastefully decorated apartments comes with a bathroom, a telephone, Internet access and a hire safe. In the outdoor complex is a freshwater swimming pool as well as a furnished sun terrace for guests to take advantage of. Furthermore, there is an indoor swimming pool, a sauna and a gym available for use.FarePortal

name: Dreams Jade Resort & Spa
address: Unidad 26, 77580 Puerto Morelos, Quintana Roo
description: Set right on a stunning sandy beach and surrounded by a beautiful landscape of crystal blue waters, this spectacular holiday resort offers a unique experience of complete luxury on the Mexican coast. The complex is situated at just a 10-minute drive away from Puerto Morelos and lies between the city of Cancun and Playa del Carmen. The guest rooms are fitted with a beautiful Mediterranean decoration and top-notch amenities such as a private balcony, free Internet access and an iPod docking station. When it comes for dining, travellers can choose between different culinary options including local and international dishes. There is also a great selection of bars and lounges where visitors may taste some delicious drinks. The hotel offers a wide range of entertainment venues for all ages, including a kids' club, activities for teens, game courts and a spa where guests may indulge themselves with the latest treatments.FarePortal

name: Villa del Palmar Cancun Luxury Beach Resort & Spa
address: Carretera Punta Sam Km. 5.2, 77400 Cancún, Quintana Roo
description: The beachfront Villa del Palmar Cancun Beach Resort & Spa is located just 15 minutes’ drive outside central Cancún. It offers 5 outdoor pools, 4 outdoor hot tubs and elegant, air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen cable TV and a balcony. The rooms at the Villa del Palmar Cancun feature tiled floors and stylish décor. Each one comes with a private bathroom and a kitchenette with a microwave. The hotel organises trips in a glass-bottomed boat, as well as other activities. Staff at reception can provide information about what to see and do on the Yucatán Peninsula. A buffet breakfast is served on the terrace or in the dining room. The hotel features a Deli and 6 restaurants serving international food. The Mayan ruins at Tulum are around 1.5 hours’ drive from the Villa Palmar. You can drive to Cancún Airport in 25 minutes.
